item.title: How to add a status page to your Hugo blog
item.description: Shortest guide possible, let’s go ⚡️ Setting up a status page I recommend onlineornot.com. Take your blog’s URL. For me, that’s https://mrnice.dev. Create a new check on that URL. Pick “Monitor a website”. Create a status page, and choose your subdomain. I went with mrnicedev ~> you’ll end up with a URL like https://mrnicedev.onlineornot.com. You should get something that looks like this: Adding the status page link to your blog We’ll do it from the config.
